TextView.android:text: If there is any ever-married/cohabited woman <50 years of age will be interviewed using this form (Respondent: Self)
Now I would like to ask about all the pregnancies and births you have had during your life.
How many times have you been pregnant, including livebirth, stillbirth, miscarriages and abortions?
While pregnant have you ever given birth?
Do you have any sons or daughters to whom you have given birth and who are now living with you?
How many sons live with you? -IF NONE, RECORD ‘00’
How many daughters live with you? -IF NONE, RECORD ‘00’
Do you have any sons or daughters to whom you have given birth who are still alive but do not live with you?
How many sons are alive but do not live with you? And How many daughters are alive but do not live with you? IF NONE, RECORD ‘00’
Number of sons living elsewhere (IF NONE, RECORD ‘00’)
Number of daughters living elsewhere (IF NONE, RECORD ‘00’)
Have you ever had a baby born alive that was born early (before 37 weeks)?
Have you ever given birth to a boy or a girl who was born alive but later died? IF NO, PROBE: Any baby who cried or showed any sign of life but only survived a few hours or days or years?
In all, how many boys have died? How many girls have died? IF NONE, RECORD ‘00’
In all, how many boys have died? IF NONE, RECORD ‘00’
In all, How many girls have died? (IF NONE, RECORD ‘00’)
How many children died in the first month of life?
Some pregnancies end before full term as miscarriage or an abortion, while others may result in a stillbirth.Have you had any pregnancies that did not result in live births?
How many times did your pregnancies end with stillbirth, abortion or miscarriage?

What was the outcome of your last pregnancy? If multiple births happened on one pregnancy then we will record one birth (live or still or abortion) based on priority. For example, if a pregnancy outcome resulted in 1 still birth and 1 live birth, we will record live birth.
Have you ever had a cesarean operation for any of your delivery?
How many cesarean operation you ever had?
Sum answers 1.9, 1.11, 1.14 and 1.17 and enter total Number of birth outcome
